name: Daily Pinball
description:
Daily Pinball is a free brick breaker game combined with bubble shooter and gravity gameplay. It is easy but addictive!

In the game, you only need to swipe your finger horizontally to aim the blocks, let go and launch all the waiting balls from above, and easily break all the bricks! Make good use of the props to increase the number and power of the ball and try to prevent the bricks from reaching the top. Act together and become the pinball master!

Game Features:
【Unique gameplay】Combination of brick breaker and bubble shooter
【Real Physics Engine】Real pinball physics engine brings an extraordinary pinball experience.
【Rich Props】A variety of random props make the game more fun.
【Fantasy Game Effects】The bricks are ever-changing colors, and the pinball effects are fantastic and beautiful. Do not blink.
【Full-age adaptation】Everyone can play and loves to play anytime, anywhere.

Slide screen pinball, crash bricks and complete all the challenges! Increase your score with skill and focus. It's time to challenge with your friends. Download now!!!
